title: Saharan venture
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures and Harry Woof
brief_description: Story of introduction of natural gas to the United Kingdom from Algeria ending dependence on coal. Covers development of fuel tanker designed for ocean transportation of natural gas in 1957 (Methane Pioneer) to arrival of the Methane Princess on October 12th 1964 with first delivery of natural gas to the United Kingdom.
